@usedefaults
{{timestamp}}

# this makes sure bootstrap datatables functionality is used
{{datatables_use}}

h3. AYS Repo Runs

{{aysruns repo:$$repo}}
{% if error is defined %}
    Error : ${error}
{% else %}
    {% for repo, runs in data.items() -%}
        h5. AYSRepo: ${repo}
        {{html:
            <table class="table table-striped table-bordered display JSdataTable dataTable">
            <thead>
              <td>Run ID</td><td>Run AT</td><td>State</td>
            </thead>
            {% for run in runs -%}
            <tr>
              <td><a data-dummy="${run['sortkey']}" href="cockpit/Run?repo=${repo}&runid=${run['id']}">${run['id']}</a></td>
              <td><span class="jstimestamp" data-ts="${run['runat']}"></span></td>
              <td>${run['state']}</td>
            </tr>
            {% else %}
            No run for this repository yet.
            {% endfor %}
            </table>
        }}
    {% endfor %}
{% endif %}
